properties.entry:
Invalid TTY backend specification.
Expected: stdio ';' <port> | file ';' <port> ';' <path> | nmdm ';' <port>
Where: <port> = 'com1' | 'com2' | 'bootrom'
Examples: stdio;com1 file;bootrom;/tmp/xyz nmdm;com2
Received: {0}

Invalid storage backend specification.
Expected: file ';' <path> | zfs-volume
Where: <path> = Any UNIX-like path
Examples: file;/tmp/xyz zfs-volume
Received: {0}

Invalid virtio network backend specification. Expected: tap ';' <tapDevice> ';' <macAddress> | vmnet ';' <vmnetDevice> ';' <macAddress>
Where: <tapDevice> = 'tap[0-9]{1,13}' <vmnetDevice> = 'vmnet[0-9]{1,11}' <macAddress> = '[a-f0-9]{2}:[a-f0-9]{2}:[a-f0-9]{2}:[a-f0-9]{2}:[a-f0-9]{2}:[a-f0-9]{2}'
Examples: tap;tap23;d9:63:c0:d9:09:e8 tap;tap0000000000001;d9:63:c0:d9:09:e8 vmnet;vmnet23;d9:63:c0:d9:09:e8 vmnet;vmnet00000000001;d9:63:c0:d9:09:e8
Received: {0}

Invalid device PCI slot specification.
Expected: <bus> ':' <slot> ':' <function>
Where: <bus> = [0 .. 255] <slot> = [0 .. 31] <function> = [0 .. 7]
Examples: 0:0:0 255:31:7
Received: {0}
